title: Screen sharing (originating on linux) not visible in meetings, visible in direct calls
body:
**Describe the bug**
If I join a meeting and someone using linux shares the screen, all I see is black.
If I call the same person directly, and they share the screen on that direct call, I can see the screen share as usual.

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Fedora
 - Installation package: rpm
 - Version 1.11.'

**Debug**
I tried to get debug logs, but nothing relevant to the issue showed up
